meanings.definition: Relating to or located near an accessory structure or organ.
meanings.sent1: The adnexal glands are important for skin health.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the adnexal structures during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The adnexal hair clip added a touch of glamour to her outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her adnexal earrings were like shimmering stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The adnexal growth on the plant looked like a tiny leafy crown.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the appendages of an organ or structure.
meanings.sent1: The adnexal tentacles of the octopus helped it catch prey.
meanings.sent2: The adnexal fins of the fish provided balance in the water.
meanings.sent3: She playfully wiggled her adnexal fingers in the air.
meanings.sent4: The adnexal branches of the tree reached out like welcoming arms.
meanings.sent5: The adnexal feathers of the bird shimmered in the sunlight.
